Articles.Content:
Here's my new ESA's Mars Express replica, about real size, equipped with science!

Also includes the Beagle-2 lander, no warranties of safe-landing capability!

http://imgur.com/a/mNqY3#0

If someone has a Soyuz/Fregat, please post and I can put her into space!

Download

http://www.dropbox.com/s/ofhoddsbw94ph3f/Mars%20Express.craft

Action groups

1-Toggle High Gain Antenna

2-Toggle panels

3-Deploy Beagle-2

4-Toggle MARSIS

5-Do TEH SCIENCE!

6-(Beagle-2) Deploy chute

7-(Beagle-2) Toggle panels

8-(Beagle-2)Do TEH SCIENCE!
cool RCS thrusters! goddarnit why didn't I think of that?
